docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 25 -- The United States expects to supply, in increasing quantities, the defense materials urgently needed from this country by Latin-American governments, Sumner Welles, Under Secretary of State, declared tonight in a nationally...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 25 -- The United States expects to supply, in increasing quantities, the defense materials urgently needed from this country by Latin-American governments, Sumner Welles, Under Secretary of State, declared tonight in a nationally broadcast radio speech that was rebroadcast by short-wave in Spanish.

docs.lead_paragraph: Gilbert F. Coyle, assistant freight traffic manager of the Grace Line, has been made freight traffic manger, succeeding James E. Magner, who was recently named vice presdent in charge of passenger affairs, it was announced yesterday by R.R. Adams, executive vice president of the line.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Aug. 30 (AP) -- The four most influential newspapers in Buenos Aires chorused a demand today that Acting President Ramon S. Castillo scrap his policy of "strict neutrality toward all," for which he was criticized, and throw...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Aug. 30 (AP) -- The four most influential newspapers in Buenos Aires chorused a demand today that Acting President Ramon S. Castillo scrap his policy of "strict neutrality toward all," for which he was criticized, and throw Argentina's weight into the fight against Nazi influence in the New World.
docs.abstract: 4 strongest Argentine newspapers demand Argentine neutrality scrapping to combat Nazis

headline.main: ARGENTINA URGED TO COMBAT NAZIS; Four Strongest Papers in the Capital Demand Scrapping of 'Strict Neutrality'

docs.lead_paragraph: Passenger traffic between the East Coast of the United States and the East Coast of South America by the American Republics Line, which has risen steadily in the last two years, continued to rise in the first eight months of this year, according to Leo E. Archer, general traffic manager of the company.

docs.snippet: PANAMA, R.P., Sept. 2 -- The formation of a Panamanian Commission of the Inter-American Development Commission was reported here today by Rafael Oreamuno, vice chairman of the parent body located in Washington. He has been organizing similar...
docs.lead_paragraph: PANAMA, R.P., Sept. 2 -- The formation of a Panamanian Commission of the Inter-American Development Commission was reported here today by Rafael Oreamuno, vice chairman of the parent body located in Washington. He has been organizing similar commissions in each capital in Latin America for nine months.

headline.main: PANAMANIANS FORM ECONOMIC SURVEY; Organize Commission to Aid in Inter-American Development
